titleStmt.title: The account of the Popes procession at Aberdene the 11th. of January, 1689. which was delivered to the new elected magistrats and council thereof, by the students of Marishal-Colledge. With the students letter to the saids magistrats thereanent.
titleStmt.author: Reid, Robert, fl. 1689.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
